publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-781 John Swinney: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2007 Amendment Order 2007—That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2007 Amendment Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*

S3M-781 John Swinney: The Draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2007 Amendment Order 2007—That the Finance Committee recommends that the draft Budget (Scotland) Act 2007 Amendment Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Bruce Crawford
